prompt.description: User-supplied text prompt driving the audio generation.

seed.description: Optional deterministic seed for reproducible generations.

duration_seconds.description: Requested audio duration in whole seconds.

model_id.description: Identifier for the backend model to use (e.g. musicgen-stereo-medium, riffusion-v1).

cfg_scale.description: Classifier-free guidance scale; higher values enforce the prompt more strongly.

scheduler.description: Optional scheduler identifier for diffusion backends.

riffusion_num_inference_steps.description: Override the default number of diffusion steps for Riffusion renders.

riffusion_guidance_scale.description: Explicit guidance scale override for Riffusion.

riffusion_scheduler.description: Scheduler identifier applied to the Riffusion diffusion pipeline.

output_sample_rate.description: Override the export sample rate for the rendered audio.

output_bit_depth.description: Override the export bit depth (pcm16, pcm24, pcm32, float32).

output_format.description: Override the export container format (currently wav).

plan.description: Optional precomputed composition plan to render.
